name: Dungeon Entrance Hall
description: You stand at the entrance of an ancient dungeon. The stone archway is crumbling with age, and a faint breeze carries the smell of damp earth. Torches flicker weakly on the walls, casting dancing shadows on the floor. Before you, a long corridor stretches into darkness.

exits.description: A dark corridor leads deeper into the dungeon

items.pickupMessage: You find a healing potion among the debris.
